channel.title: The Art of Marketing Science
channel.description: A blog dedicated to Marketing Science covering from concepts to practical examples with code. Oh, it's also my personal data science sandbox for tinkering with data things and go on data science rants.

item.title: Problems before tools: A story of the full-stack data scientist
item.description: A perspective into the benefits of a full-stack data science generalists over narrow functional specialists

item.title: What are Geo Experiments and how it is used in marketing
item.description: Geo Experments are used to measure causality and incrementality when traditional A/B testing cannot be used

item.title: Regression, a must have for Marketing Analysts
item.description: Regression is a must have tool for marketing analysts

item.title: From Marketing Analytics To Marketing Science
item.description: Evolving from marketing analytics to marketing science

item.title: Vanderbilt Regression Modelling Strategies Course
item.description: Summary of Regression Modelling Strategies course taught by Frank Harell at the University of Vanderbilt

item.title: Marvel Cinematic Data Visualization With Plot.ly
item.description: 3D network graph of Marvel characters using Plot.ly

item.title: Dimension Reduction with Principal Component Analysis
item.description: Principal Component Analysis explained with example in Python

item.description: Dimensionality reduction with feature selection and extraction
